channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Comment Link Remove and Other Comment Tools
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Comment Link Remove and Other Comment Tools

item.title: CVE-2021-24725|2024-08-03T19:42:16.624Z -- unknown -- comment%20link%20remove%20and%20other%20comment%20tools
item.description: The Comment Link Remove and Other Comment Tools WordPress plugin before 2.1.6 does not have CSRF check in its 'Delete comments easily', which could allow attackers to make logged in admin delete arbitrary comments
